resources.string: The login info that you specified does not match any existing accounts. Please try again.
Your passwords do not match. Check that you have entered both correctly.
That username has been used incorrectly at least 3 times, so the matching account was locked. Please contact an administrator to resolve the issue.
You have not filled in some log in information. Please complete all fields.
You have not filled in some information. Please complete all fields.
That username is invalid. Please only use letters and numbers.
An account with that username already exists. Please choose a different one.
At least one of your PPM's is not an integer.
Your old password is incorrect. Either remove it from the entry field to leave your old password or check that it is correct.
Your new passwords do not match. Either remove them to leave your old password or check that they match.
To edit your account, fill in the below fields. To leave a field unchanged, put no information in the field.
